Package cs2030.simulator

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.Server

  • class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the unique attributes for a server – id and serviceTime – and the methods that are necessary to handle a customer in a shop. A server can service, wait, and reject customers. It relies on another class to keep track of time.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) static class  Server.Statistics
      inner nested static class to keep track of the information for all servers encapsulates all necessary information for the simulation

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static int Id
      class field to keep track of the number of servers created.
      boolean idle
      true if the server is not serving anyone and no customer is waiting.
      private Customer servedCustomer
      stores the reference to the object of the currently served customer
      boolean serverAvailable
      true if server has space for a customer to wait false otherwise
      private int serverId
      the ID of the instantiated server
      private Customer waitingCustomer
      stores the reference to the object of the currently waiting customer

        class field to keep track of the number of servers created. Used for ID

      • serverId

        private final int serverId
        the ID of the instantiated server

      • idle

        public boolean idle
        true if the server is not serving anyone and no customer is waiting. false otherwise

      • serverAvailable

        true if server has space for a customer to wait false otherwise

        stores the reference to the object of the currently served customer

    • Method Detail

      • handleCustomer

        public Event handleCustomer​(Customer customer,
                            double handleTime)
        makes the server handle the customer either serving, making the customer wait, or rejecting him.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer to be handled
        servedTime - the time the customer is handled by the server

      • serveCustomer

        private Event serveCustomer​(Customer customer,
                            double servedTime)
        serve the customer and return a CustDone event
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer being served
        servedTime - the time the customer is served

      • delayCustomer

        private void delayCustomer​(Customer customer)
        adds the customer to the server's wait queue
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer that is to be delayed

      • rejectCustomer

        private void rejectCustomer​(Customer customer)
        rejects a customer and prints the line
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer to be rejected PRECONDITION: the waiter is serving a customer and is unavailable

      • finishCustomer

        public Event finishCustomer​(double finishTime)
        Used to finish a customer after he has been served. will serve a waiting customer if there is any.
        Parameters:
        finishTime - the time the customer is finished.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • customerFinishTime

        private static double customerFinishTime​(Customer customer,
                                         double servedTime)

      • updateStatistics

        private static void updateStatistics​(Customer customer,
                                     java.lang.String status)
        update the statistics for the customer that has been served or rejected. Stats updated: total waiting time, total customers served, total customers rejected
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer whose attributes will be used to update data
        status - whether the customer has been served or rejected
